teo.isgci.problem

Class Reduction

  • java.lang.Object
    • teo.isgci.problem.Reduction

  • public class Reduction
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a reduction from a parent to a child. If parent can be solved with complexity x on a class, then child can be solved with complexity complexity + x on the same class. Conversely, if child is (co)NPC on a class, then so is the parent.

    • Field Summary

      protected Problem child 
      protected java.util.List<Algorithm> childAlgos
      The algorithms solving the parent/child problems

      protected java.util.List<Algorithm> parentAlgos
      The algorithms solving the parent/child problems

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Reduction(Problem child, Problem parent)
      Create a new linear/constant time reduction from parent to child.
      Reduction(Problem child, Problem parent, Complexity complexity)
      Create a new poly/linear/constant time reduction from parent to child.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Complexity fromChild(Complexity c)
      If child can be solved on a graph class in time c, return the complexity of parent for this class.

      If parent can be solved on a graph class in time c, return the complexity of child for this class.
      Problem getChild() 
      Algorithm getChildAlgo(Complexity c)
      Return an algorithm that solves child on a class in time c, assuming the parent can be solved.

      protected Algorithm getReductionAlgo(Problem p, Complexity c, java.lang.String why)
      Find an algorithm of the requested complexity for p (either parent or child).

      • getReductionAlgo

        protected Algorithm getReductionAlgo(Problem p,
                         Complexity c,
                         java.lang.String why)
        Find an algorithm of the requested complexity for p (either parent or child). If it doesn't exist yet, create it node-independently with the given complexity and text.

      • getParentAlgo

        public Algorithm getParentAlgo(Complexity c)
        Return an algorithm that solves parent on a class in time c, assuming the child can be solved.

      • getChildAlgo

        public Algorithm getChildAlgo(Complexity c)
        Return an algorithm that solves child on a class in time c, assuming the parent can be solved.
